segments.text: As I look closer, I can see the child's excitement as he retrieves cookie after cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost infectious, but I can't help feeling uneasy watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears, and I feel a knot tightening in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Each cookie he retrieves seems to heighten the tension in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman finishes polishing the plate, still blissfully unaware of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to call out, to make them stop, but part of me is rooted in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Life has a way of unfolding in unpredictable ways, doesnâ€™t it?
segments.speaker: PAR
